foundations.title: Mathematics for ML
foundations.description: Learn linear algebra, calculus, and probability.

foundations.title: Programming
foundations.description: Master Python basics and data structures.

foundations.title: Data Analysis
foundations.description: Explore Pandas, NumPy, and data visualization.

coreML.title: Model Evaluation
coreML.description: Study metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall.

advanced.title: Deep Learning
advanced.description: Dive into neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs.

advanced.title: Reinforcement Learning
advanced.description: Learn about agents, rewards, and policies.

practice.title: Kaggle Competitions
practice.description: Participate in ML competitions to solve real-world problems.

practice.title: Personal Projects
practice.description: Build end-to-end ML projects (e.g., recommendation systems, chatbots).

practice.title: Open Source Contributions
practice.description: Contribute to ML libraries like Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.
